title: koDubEga divyamati
sahitya:
koDu bEga divyamati sarasvati 

(koDu)



anupallavi



mrda harihaya mukharodayaLe ninnaya aDigaLi eraguve amma

brmmana rANi 

(koDu)



caraNam 1



indirA ramaNana hiriya sosayu nInu bandenna vadanadi nindu

nAmava nudise 

(koDu)



caraNam 2



akhila vidyAbhimAni ajana pattadarANi sukhavittu pAlise sujana

shirOmaNi 

(koDu)



caraNam 3



patita pAvane nI gatiyendu nambidE satata purandara viThalana

tOrE 

(koDu)
